name: Word Quest - Free Word Challenge
description:
The future of the letters rests on your hand!

Choose your letters or rely on luck! With letters at hand create as many words as you can within 90 seconds!

Each word created will increase a limit! 3 letters word will add 3 seconds, 4 letters word 4 seconds and so on!

The longer the words you give the higher your score will be! Go for highscores and submit your score to a global leaderboard to see who is the best word creator!

Features:
* 100% free full word search game!
* Local and global leaderboards included, you are playing against people all around the world!
* Great educational game - learn new words and vocabularies
* Improve your spelling skills!
* Each game is different!
* Over 170 000 possible words!

Have fun with our app Word Quest Maia!

If you find any bug or have any question, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com.
